org.numenta.nupic.util

Class PatternMachine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.numenta.nupic.util.PatternMachine
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConsecutivePatternMachine

    public class PatternMachine
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for generating and manipulating patterns, for use in experimentation and tests.
    Author:
    David Ray
    See Also:
    ConsecutivePatternMachine, SequenceMachine

      Returns a Set of numbers whose size equals the number num and whose values range from 0 to "population".

      Returns a sorted map whose set entries are also sorted.
      java.util.LinkedHashSet<java.lang.Integer> xrange(int start, int upperBounds)
      Returns an ordered Set of Integers starting at the specified number (start), and ending with the specified number (upperBounds).
